Class FlexShrink

java.lang.Object
com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.core.AbstractCssProperty<FlexShrink>
com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.css3.FlexShrink
All Implemented Interfaces:
CssProperty, Serializable, Cloneable
public class FlexShrink extends AbstractCssProperty<FlexShrink>
  flex-shrink: number|initial|inherit;
 The flex-shrink property specifies how the item will shrink relative to the rest of the flexible items inside the same container.

 Note: If the element is not a flexible item, the flex-shrink property has no effect.
 Default value:  1
 Inherited:      no
 Animatable:     yes
 Version:        CSS3
 JavaScript syntax:      object.style.flexShrink="5"
Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
